bioAsHtml: Koen is developing Java/JEE applications since 2000. He has a broad and deep knowledge of Java and also of the complete software development cycle. He is practicing 'Agile software development' since 2005 and has fulfilled roles ranging from developer to architect, coach, technical team lead. Koen excels in agile, zero calories development based upon microservices, RESTfull api's, asynchronous messaging, single page javascript applications. Automated builds, automated tests, continuous integration, continuous delivery being self-evident.
